attributes.action: halt the current MTAS (Medical Training Application System) job application round
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current MTAS system is flawed and junior doctors in training are concerned that it is unfair. Able doctors are not being offered interviews and some interview panels have refused to take part due to their concerns. We must halt this process and reassess the whole application procedure urgently.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MTAS-NHS/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
